trans-unit.source: Provides information about a parameter or return value of a method that belongs to a type that components can access across application domain and process boundaries.

The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteParameterData> structure provides information about a parameter or return value of a method that belongs to a type that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
Represents the attributes of the method parameter that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteParameterData"></xref> describes.
Represents the default value of the method parameter that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteParameterData"></xref> describes.
Indicates whether this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteParameterData"></xref> describes a method parameter that is passed by reference.

The value of this field is `true` if this <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteParameterData> describes a method parameter that is passed by reference; otherwise, the value of this field is `false`.
Indicates whether this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteParameterData"></xref> describes a method parameter that can have a variable number of arguments.

The value of this field is `true` if this <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteParameterData> describes a parameter that can have a variable number of arguments; otherwise, the value of this field is `false`.
The value of this field is always `false` if this <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteParameterData> describes a parameter of a method provided by a COM object.
Parameters that can have a variable number of arguments are specified by the `params` (for Visual C#) and `ParamArray` (for Visual Basic) keywords.
Represents the name of the method parameter that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteParameterData"></xref> describes.
Represents the type of the method parameter or return value that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteParameterData"></xref> describes.
Represents the position of the method parameter that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteParameterData"></xref> describes in relation to the other parameters of the method.
